definition: at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at

sentences.english: At that night, Guan Yue flied to Beijing to fetch the bill of lading.
sentences.chinese: 当晚，关跃就乘飞机赶到北京拿回取货单。

sentences.english: The meeting that night was delayed because one of the members was late.
sentences.chinese: 由于一位作家成员迟到，当晚的会议推迟进行。

sentences.english: When late rend away victim Li Cheng wait a student the cellular phone is three and the lump is 47 dollars.
sentences.chinese: 当晚抢走受害人李成等学生手机三部及现金47元。

sentences.english: When the party came to the end, we said "Happy New Year" to each other.
sentences.chinese: 当晚会即将结束时，我们互祝“新年快乐”。

sentences.english: The team's field headquarters that night would be an empty building on the very edge of town.
sentences.chinese: 别动队当晚的战地指挥部就设在城边的一座空楼里。

sentences.english: That night we all went to sleep uneasy.
sentences.chinese: 当晚我们忐忑不安的上床睡觉。

sentences.english: However, the most emotional part of the evening was devoted to health care.
sentences.chinese: 不过当晚最使人动感情的演讲都是关于医疗保健的。

sentences.english: This night, they ran along with the path in ZeZhong.
sentences.chinese: 当晚，刘邦一行人在泽中小道逃跑。

sentences.english: They topped off the evening with a ferryboat ride at midnight.
sentences.chinese: 他们以午夜乘坐渡轮泛游结束了当晚的活动。

sentences.english: Overnight they'll take your books apart.
sentences.chinese: 当晚，他们将分析研究你的帐册。

sentences.english: That night the French presidential palace issued a carefully worded statement.
sentences.chinese: 法国总统府当晚发表了一份措辞严谨的声明。

sentences.english: We also ask all supporters to wear red and white on the night.
sentences.chinese: 我们也希望所有的球迷当晚穿着红白色的衣服。

sentences.english: But that night I also had one of my first lessons on how things were done with Menudo.
sentences.chinese: 不过当晚我也学到了我在Menudo的第一课。

sentences.english: That night Liu Fu bomb attacks, jinshan take advantage of the disorder will take the picture.
sentences.chinese: 当晚刘府遭遇炸弹袭击，金山趁乱将这幅画取走。

sentences.english: On March 8, Chiang's troops arrived in Keelung and that night entered the capital of Taipeh.
sentences.chinese: 三月八日，蒋军开抵基隆，当晚进入省城台北。

sentences.english: The Rostovs' party stopped for that night at Mytishtchy, twenty versts from Moscow.
sentences.chinese: 罗斯托夫家的车队当晚停留在梅季希村。

definition: very early in the morning/in the wee hours
that very night/through the night/for several nights in a row
the scene (of a crime, accident etc)/(on) the spot/(at) the site
